name: Php Webhook Client
description: A sample microservice to subscribe and react to Weebly Webhook events.

WEEBLY_APP_NAME.description: Replace {{PREFIX}} with your first initial and the first three characters of your last name, keep `-env-sub` as is.

WEEBLY_CLIENT_ID.description: The `Client ID` for your Weebly app, obtained from the Weebly Developer Admin Portal: https://www.weebly.com/developer-admin/

WEEBLY_SECRET.description: The `Secret` for your Weebly app, obtained from the Weebly Developer Admin Portal: https://www.weebly.com/developer-admin/
